summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6090 for the improvement of Prosper Street from Arapahoe Place to 38th Avenue West; and certain other streets and avenues, by paving with portland cement concrete and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 83984, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
